author: Zachary Cohen, CNN
title: Trump administration shuttered pandemic monitoring program, then scrambled to extend it
description: As early indications of China's coronavirus outbreak emerged in late December, the Trump administration notified Congress it would still follow through with its plan to shutter a US Agency for International Development surveillance program tasked with detecti…
